name: Dasher (itch) (JsphLm)
description:
GMTK 2021 - Joined Together

Control /s : 

A - Left 

D - Right 

Space - Jump / Double Jump

Left Shift - Dash

Left Click - Teleport

To comply with this year's GMTK theme, I decided to make a 2d side-scrolling game that can be controlled by BOTH keyboard and mouse.
